summary: A bull terrier tells his life story, from the streets of the Bowery to a life of luxury.

O'Brien|Max Power|Robert Robinson|Dick Ryan|Scott Seaton|Charles Sherlock|J. Lewis Smith|Stephen Soldi|Harry Tenbrook|David Thursby|Florence Wix|Jeff York
title: It's a Dog's Life
